document_data.caption: A mandolin from [[Aurora's Emporium]].
document_data.name: Mandolin
document_data.Description:
When played as accompanying instruments, mandolins provided a delicate fluttering sound. They were also performed as solo instruments.

Mandolins produced in [[Calimshan]] were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''.

Notable mandolins.[[Canaith mandolin]]: One of the seven [[Instrument of the Bards|Instruments of the Bards]]. Magical mandolins that had healing powers and provided protection from lightning, among other magical powers.

document_data.Notable Users: * [[Adagio Jones]], a member of the [[bard]]ic group [[Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds]], had a mandolin that he played for ballads and songs that involved the group's string ensemble.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/54/The New Rogues Gallery: Adagio Jones and The Goodwinds|8}}
